description: I. Independent health check review of student finance England: a review of the Student Loans Company preparedness to implement planned changes and improvements to support the 10/11 Academic year cycle and the Customer First programme. 22 April 2010. Final report. Incl. appendices. 71 p. II. Letter dated 25/05/2010 from David Willetts MP to Pat McFadden MP regarding the Chair of the Student Loans Company. 1 p. III. Letter dated 24/05/2010 from John G Goodfellow to David Willetts MP tendering his resignation as Chairman of the Student Loan Company. 1 p.
department: Pricewaterhouse Coopers Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
